content:
The Russian tank, which was on the offensive, was lined with Javelin and continued its journey with flames from all holes.

AppropriateThe video outlinedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

According to him, the impressions were made by the fighters of a separate mechanized brigade named after Prince Vladimir Monomakh.

Asreported the armyinform, Land troops showed the blast of the Russian tank.
title: The defense forces destroyed an enemy tank with a Javelin
description: The corresponding video posted the General Staff of the Armed Forces. According to him, the impressions were made by fighters of a separate ...
author: Army Inform
